column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtwe haahaw hwehwɛ nwora nsu no
column3: Mbrɛ me kra haahaw hwehwɛ ɔwo nye no

column4: ho nsukɔm dze me kra: Dabɛn na mebɛba ebopue Nyankopɔn enyim?"

column2: "Me nyinsuwa ayɛ m'edziban adzekyee na adzesaa
column3: Mber a wɔsee me daa nyina dɛ
nna me kra ridzi awerɛhow no
column4: Mbrɛ misii enye nyimpa petsee no nantsewee na midzii hɔn enyim kɔr Nyankopɔn fie; Yɛdze enyigye na ayɛyindwom ndze
column5: dɛ nyimpa dodow a wɔrehyɛ fa."

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na abotow? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iridzi mo mu awerɛhow yi? Ma w'enyi nda Nyankopɔn do: na mebɛda ho eyi no ayɛw
me kra abotow wɔ mo mu: Dɛm ntsi na mifi Jordan asaase do
column5: na Mizar koko do mekaa wo."

column2: "Bun frɛ bun wɔ w'awor ne gyegye ntsi: W'asorɛkye na w'eminiminim nyinara afa mo do."
"Naaso EWURADZE beyi n'adɔyɛ edzi wɔ adzekyeeber
column4: Mekyerɛ mpaa a mibeyi ama mo nkwagye Nyankopɔn no a."
Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo werɛ efir me yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na menam ridzi awerɛhow wɔ ɔtamfo no ne nhyɛdo ntsi yi?"

column2: "Atseetsee a m'atamfo dze hyɛ me ntsi
column3: ɔyɛ me dɛ me mbiew rodwerew; Mber a daa wɔse me dɛ
ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na abotow yi? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iridzi mo mu awerɛhow yi? Ma w'enyi nda Nyankopɔn do: na mebɛda ho meyi no ayɛw
